profile: 'I'm a highly skilled web developer who offers a combination of cross-functional skills, including a 13+ years work experience in front-end development, focusing in Javascript based solutions. Also, I has extensive experience working with Javascript frameworks as Angular 2 and ReactJS, and front-end technologies as HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap and LESS. I also enjoys working with server-side languages as NodeJs, having vast experience with frameworks as ExpressJs and phpSlim. CMSs like Wordpress, and creating REST APIs. My expertise includes gathering and analyzing project requirements, Lead Teams and integrating solutions architecture and design using Object Oriented Techniques.
